amendment.description: Amendment requires a penalty for prime contractors that do not provide information to databases on contracts in Iraq and Afghanistan by withholding award and incentive fee payments and it adds a reporting requirement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 81 printed in House Report 111-498 to require a penalty for prime contractors that do not provide information to databases on contracts in Iraq and Afghanistan, and it adds a reporting requirement. The penalty would withhold award and incentive fee payments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
